Title: [Entware] Rtorrent/rutorrent easy installation script
Description:
Rtorrent is lightweight torrent client, IMHO it's lighter and faster then Transmsission but harder to configure.

This script helps to set up rtorrent with uTorrent-like web UI. A password protection is optional.

Now it's in Entware repo. Type opkg install rtorrent-easy-install to use it.
